pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
I removed my approval since this breaks the windows jobs of other projects that aren't yet using ignition-cmake:

* [ignition_rndf-ci-default-windows7](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_rndf-ci-default-windows7-amd64/37) has cmake configuration error because of switch to VS 2017
* [ignition_transport-ci-default-windows7](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_transport-ci-default-windows7-amd64/118) has linking errors because of switch to VS 2017
